definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: (√ of foll. cf. Ar. 9am=a be comprehensive, include; 9am=un company; also paternal uncle; perhaps As. ummanu, people; Sab. [[עם]] either (a) people, or (b) paternal uncle CIS:iv. p. 20; pl. sf. [[אעממהו]] = (b) Mordtm:Himj. Inschr. 45. 70; also often in n.pr. CIS:iv. No. 5, 1, 99, 7 etc., Prät:Neue Beitr. 25 Hom:Chrest. 12, 133; A. und A. 6 We:GGN 1893, 480). p. 770
